${modID}:PotionID.NAME: Some Kind of Potion

${modID}:BrandPotion.NAME: Brand Potion

${modID}:IceDevilPotion.NAME: Ice Devil Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of #yExhausted cards used in this combat.

${modID}:HeavenlyPotion.NAME: Heavenly Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Make ALL Attack cards in your hand gain #yExhausted and #yEthereal.
